articles.description: It’s now more than 48 hours since the Wallabies lost to England on Sunday morning, Australian time. And now that the immediate emotional post-mortems and reaction of varying levels of rationality are behind us, I’m left with a strange but somewhat familiar fe…

articles.description: India vs New Zealand: KL Rahul spoke to the media ahead of his side's upcoming T20I series against the Blackcaps. The wicketkeeper-batter has been appointed as vice-captain for the series.
